website_summaries.verdict: We recommend these Maui Jims for consumers who need a fancy pair of sunglasses, but not for those who are seeking a casual, everyday look.
pros: ideal for dressy events and special occasions
cons: Some wearers complain they fit tightly around the temples
They're large, making them awkward for women with small faces

customer_reviews.title: Cutest Maui Jim’s
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd pair of Maui Jim sunglasses and their styles keep on getting cuter! I recently broke my last pair that I had for 10 years and took s chance on the orchids. Zero regrets! So happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Elmore

customer_reviews.title: The SELLER NOT GOOD!!
customer_reviews.text: When I first received the glasses I thought they were great, however, almost immediately after receiving them EVERY day when I would go to put them on I have to really clean them because they have this weird film on them. I contacted the seller and the seller "closed" the return because they said my return time had expired. It's definitely NOT worth it, spend a little extra and get what you pay for! The seller is the one NOT good. I ordered the cheaper pair from Australia and I think that is the problem with the glasses. The seller is Designer Eyewear. Stay away from them!!
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: WOWOOWOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: New to Maui Jim after being a Bvlgari fan. Have always loved rose lenses and took a chance on these shades. Wow! The frames are probably not as thick as I would have expected, but the lens quality is second to none! Polarized rose???? Yes. Take my money all day long. And the rubberized bridge support is equally worth it. I have a medium square face and these glasses were instantly comfortable with unmatched clarity. DO IT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Podqueen

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, perfect vision
customer_reviews.text: These Maui Jim Orchid sunglasses look and feel great! I love the tortoiseshell look on the front and the teal color inside. They are large enough to give you complete coverage of your eyes without being huge the polarization gives you crystal clear vision. While looking at the ocean in Hawaii, I could see more colors and there was no squinting. There are felt nose pads which are nice and no tangling your hair when you push your sunglasses up on your head. Love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark McKeague

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE these sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with these sunglasses at my eye doctor's office, but they were really expensive there so I went on the search. Luckily, I struck gold and found them here!!!! These sunglasses have amazing polarized lenses. They fit great, they aren't heavy. I adore the pink/raspberry color. And they are the right fit for my face so they look good too. I couldn't be happier with my purchase. AND, they were in perfect condition, brand new in the box!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy G

customer_reviews.title: Love these glasses -- unfortunately had these sunglasses and they ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses -- unfortunately had these sunglasses and they got damaged beyond repair (car ran over them - sad, sad day). This retailer is a legit online retailer for Maui Jim products (can confirm on Maui JIm website and seller's) and sunglasses were authentic. I already knew I loved this style and the price was about $35 cheaper here than elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: happyshopper

customer_reviews.title: They Look Great But...
customer_reviews.text: My friends kept saying I had to try these glasses so I broke down and bought a pair. I do like how the lens works, but that's about it. They are bulky and not very comfortable even though I normally wear large glasses. Not worth the price tag or the hype.
customer_reviews.author: G Baker-Cinnamon

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Could not love these more the brown mirror is perfect for hiding dramatic eye rolling. Very cute on. Had a pair for 2 years lost them 6 months ago have looked for a pair for months but nothing compares. My mom and sister both got the same pair because they liked mine so much. Best sunglasses ever! Worth the price twice!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Paul

customer_reviews.title: This was a returned item from someone. So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Glasses were pretty.. couldn't wait to get them. Only complaint was I think they a returned item from someone... packaging inside all had been opened and glasses were a little bent.
customer_reviews.author: Tom R Outley

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute and was excited to get them. The UV protection on them is a bit odd when wearing them, colors aren't quite a crisp as I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Karrie

customer_reviews.title: Yes yes yes!
customer_reviews.text: Best sunglasses I've ever purchased. I am so glad I spent the extra money, totally worth it. They are a bit heavy, but tje quality, durability, clarity and color is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sunglasses and would have kept them but have to return them, ONLY because I found "my" Maui Jim's that I thought I lost however they were misplaced.
customer_reviews.author: MARYANN GOBEL

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and stylish sunglasses.  Perfectly polarized and excellent fit.
customer_reviews.text: The glasses fit perfectly on my medium size head and look very good with my square face shape. They do not slip and are very comfortable. The shade of the lenses and polarization are perfect for both sunny and cloudy days. Love the peacock blue which lines the inside of the frames. The overall look is very stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Goff

customer_reviews.title: Grey Tortoise Stripe/Neutral Grey -- nice color, exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: Grey Tortoise Stripe/Neutral Grey -- nice color, exactly as expected. Good fit. The nose pads prevent slippage. Great quality. I agree with another post that they slip off your head if you put them up top. They are not boating glasses for sure. The glasses come with a microfiber pouch that I also use to clean the glasses -- can be kept inside the hard case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife. She loves them and says they make her eyes feel better the moment she puts them on. They look great. Arrived very fast. Highly recommended and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jim K.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I recently had eye surgery and my eyes are super sensitive. These glasses are fantastic! I am able to wear the glasses on the sunniest days with no issue. They are lightweight and comfortable. Also, they are very stylish. I would HIGHLY RECOMMEND THESE GLASSES!
customer_reviews.author: Funke

customer_reviews.title: DEISGN
customer_reviews.text: I simply look good in cat eye and by online order they were perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: temple pain
customer_reviews.text: It had nothing to do with the shipper - this pair just dug into my temples. I have 3 pairs of Maui Jim's and absolutely love them...but these just didn't fit my face well, the cat eyes sure were cool though!
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Renee @UsJohnsons

customer_reviews.title: Great Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Great sunglasses. Good fit. Comfortable. No weird visual affects through the lenses. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Marie B

customer_reviews.title: Replacement
customer_reviews.text: Ordered to replace Orchid sunglasses lost. Very comfortable fit and Maui Jim sunglasses have incredibly sharp optics. First purchased on a cruise, nice glasses for cloudy days too—the day looks so much rosier through these sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: HolidaySue

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: While the shipping was pretty bad everything was expected. They box wasn't padded during shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Boymom

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sunglasses worth every penny I can’t believe how crystal clear everything is
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Girlie and sporty.
customer_reviews.text: I had just purchased a different pair of sunglasses twice the price. I’ve always had a more sporty look so I wanted to get something more classic. I returned them and bought these. My original choice. Very comfortable and classic.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon hatfield

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Got my first pair a few years ago, glad I purchased another. Lens cuts down the glare and the view is crisp and clean. Would highly recommend, with the price for a great pair of sunglasses
customer_reviews.author: Anna L Laber

customer_reviews.title: I like them a lot
customer_reviews.text: Very cool glasses! Saw these in store. Fit great. My other pair of MJ are 9yrs old and still going strong. 😎
customer_reviews.author: ANLV

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love them!! They look so good in person (better than expected), fit perfect, and the lens are great! I have a round, smaller face and they fit well, not too big! Very pleased! Well worth it every penny!! I researched a LOT!! So glad I chose these!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Reigner

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and function perfectly. I have a sensitivity to light. No matter how many glasses I try none have worked like these.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my wife’s birthday. Her first Maui Jim‘s. The product showed up covered in fingerprints the case was falling apart upon arrival. Does not appear to be a new product.
customer_reviews.author: James A Faltz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best sunglasses are Maui Jim's! Very pretty tint and fit my narrow face well.
customer_reviews.author: Jules T.

customer_reviews.title: Best sunglasses ever
customer_reviews.text: Love them, light, beatiful, see everything so clearly,wit a beautiful pink tone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these glasses
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses! Very comfortable and I get many compliments. When I put them up on top of my head, they do tend to slide off easily since my hair is straight and there is no real grip on the arms (like my Oakley's). Can't wait to wear them on the boat and see how they are on the water!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Maui Jim sunglasses arrived quickly and are super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Love Maui Jim sunglasses these were priced competitively and were as advertised. I have been loving wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Celia Morris

customer_reviews.title: Maui Jim sunglasses never disappoint!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Maui Jims for years, and only find myself buying new pairs because styles change. The quality is amazing... there is no other brand like them!
customer_reviews.author: Keith B. Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: but really small for my face and did not like the green lens once I went outdoors
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive, but really small for my face and did not like the green lens once I went outdoors. Returned this item.
customer_reviews.author: lisataylor

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses are Amazing! They fit great and I love how they feel sitting on my nose, they don't dig in at all or slip down.
customer_reviews.author: Tammie Louzon

customer_reviews.title: Very Classy Glasses
customer_reviews.text: I lost my 1st pair after 3 years so I had to order the exact same pair and still love them!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Like that they are glass for best clarity
customer_reviews.text: Like that they are glass for best clarity. Think they are more fashionable than some of Mauk Jim's other offerings. Good size,but not too big.
customer_reviews.author: dugbec

customer_reviews.title: Great for the glamorous look; not an everyday sunglass unless you dress to the nines
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in the grey frame/grey lens combo. The frame quality was solid but lightweight and a pretty marbled black/lt grey. The lens were slightly metallic/reflective. I was impressed with the overall quality and the rubber nose pads to prevent dents in your nose and I would have kept them but the frames themselves were very large--ridiculously large on my small face. If it's the glamour look you're after, these will be a perfect twist on the standard black Hollywood diva sunglasses. If your features are petite and/or you need something that won't look ridiculous with basic shorts and tee-shirt at soccer games, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: These are decent sunglasses, but exceptionally expensive. With normal use of these sunglasses, proper cleaning and handling, they lasted just beyond their 2 year warranty and then a defect in the coating of the lens became very apparent. A call to customer service consisted of hearing repetition of the statement that the glasses were beyond the 2 year warranty. They could not explain why the coating on the lens broke down. I am afraid if I buy another pair the same thing will happen in 2 years and 5 days. Can't afford to replace an expensive item like this that often.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

product_meta.title: Maui Jim Women's Orchid Cat-Eye Sunglasses
product_meta.description: A pair of fashion sunglasses budding with lovely color, Orchid is inspired by the vibrant flower that often blooms beautiful and fragrant. Orchid's multi-colored frame options radiate personality, and are best for square or oblong face shapes.
feature_bullets: Click the Maui Jim link above to visit our brand store, where you can find our entire catalog of sunglasses
All Maui Jim sunglasses feature PolarizedPlus2 lens technology that go beyond shielding your eyes from glare and harmful UV rays by enhancing colors to reveal the true beauty of the world around you
Enjoy ultimate UV protection combined with premium style, incredible durability, glare-free vision, and color-boosting patented technologies
Maui Rose lenses provide a soothing rose tone and are excellent for full sun to overcast light conditions
Lenses made with SuperThin Glass Material provide for crisp optics and the best scratch and solvent resistance
